unnormalised: Arrey yaar, Goa trip ka budget? Don't even ask! Thought Rs. 10,000 would cover it, but turns out, just the crab curry at that fancy beach shack cost ₹3500! Plus, the auto-rickshaw walas think they're driving Ferraris – each ride cost no less than Rs. 500. Next time, I'm just staying home and ordering chai for ₹10.
normalised: Arrey yaar, Goa trip ka budget? Don't even ask! Thought rupee ten thousand would cover it, but turns out, just the crab curry at that fancy beach shack cost rupee three thousand five hundred! Plus, the auto-rickshaw walas think they're driving Ferraris – each ride cost no less than rupee five hundred. Next time, I'm just staying home and ordering chai for rupee ten.
